title: Northwestern University 5BR 2BA apartment
posting_body: Renovated 5 Bedroom 2 Bathroom apt two blocks to Campus.
Dark stained sanded hardwood floors, new individually controlled heating tall ceilings and vintage details.
Five bedrooms, large living room, dining room with built-ins, pantry, yard.
Walk to shops, theater, beach and Noyes shopping district.
Available September 1. call David Reid for appointment.
